value: Privacy Policy
I. What This Privacy Policy Covers
This Privacy Policy describes how Slowly collects, stores, uses, and shares your information. It also describes how you can control and protect your privacy.
II. Controlling and Protecting Your Privacy
Personal Safety

After getting to know someone online, you may choose to meet him or her in-person. If so, be careful and use common sense. Never meet someone in private for the first time; choose a public place, and take a friend.
Location Information

We collect your location when you first register with Slowly. We do not “track” your location, but we do collect geo-location information from your device when you log in or use Slowly, such as when you visit a particular feature that uses location. But we do not share your precise location with other users. Your geo-location showed by your account is randomly shifted for protection.
Deleting Your Account
You can edit or delete information that you upload to Slowly and you can delete your account, but you cannot recall or delete information that others have copied.
Deleting Your Information and Content

If you are under the age of 18, you can request us to delete your posted information and content. To do so, send an email to [email protected] from the email address associated with your Slowly account requesting deletion. We make reasonable efforts to comply, but we cannot guarantee we will be able to delete all of your information everywhere from our systems.
Password
Store your password in a safe place, and do not share it with anyone. If you think someone has your password, you should change it immediately.
Posting on Slowly

Posting personal information on public areas of Slowly will make it publicly available. The information you post or share with others may in turn be shared by them with still other users and it may also show up when someone uses a public search engine (even if that person is not a Slowly user). Do not post information in public areas of Slowly that you want to keep private.
Third Parties

We are not responsible for (and don’t have any control over) the privacy policies of third party websites, apps and ad servers. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of each and every website and app you visit.
III. Information We Collect

We collect different types of information about you and your activities. We collect information when you register, log into, and use Slowly, including the features you use, the pages you visit, and the information you enter. The specific examples in the following bullets are not meant to be exhaustive.

We get and record information from your device or browser, including your mobile device identification (ADID, device ID, etc.), IP address, cookie and beacon information, and geographic location.
Third Parties

When you download or register for Slowly by or through a third party platform we may also access and/or collect certain information from your third party platform account or by cookies placed on your device by such third party site. For example, if you create your Slowly account using Facebook, we may use the following information from Facebook to establish your Slowly account: your email address, hometown, gender, profile photo, date of birth, friends list and user ID.
IV. How We Use and Disclose the Information We Collect

We use and disclose your information in the following ways: (1) To customize your experience on Slowly. (2) To conduct research, including the numbers and types of visitors, and Slowly traffic. (3) To develop and test new products and features, and improve our current ones. (4) To find and fix technology problems. (5) To enforce this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service. (6) To contact you by email, text messaging, phone, autodialer or otherwise, including to invite you to participate in surveys and contests, and provide you updates and information about Slowly and our other products and services.
Cookies and Beacons
We may set and access cookies and beacons on your device or computer to customize your experience. These files help us target advertising based on your activity.
Service Providers

We transfer information to vendors, service providers, and other partners who globally support our business, such as providing technical infrastructure services, analyzing how our services are used, measuring the effectiveness of ads and services, providing customer service, facilitating payments, or conducting research and surveys. These partners must adhere to strict confidentiality obligations in a way that is consistent with this Privacy Policy and the agreements we enter into with them.
Personally Identifiable Information

Except for “Service Providers” (all described above), in connection with account verification (and then only for that purpose), or to enforce our rights under this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service, we do not share the following personal information with any third party for any reason: your exact date of birth, your first name, your last name, your address, your phone number(s), or your email address.
V. Data Security and Storage

We use industry standard security measures to prevent the loss, misuse and alteration of the information under our control. However, we cannot guarantee that our security measures will prevent “hackers” from illegally obtaining this information. We may store all information that we collect indefinitely, but we do not promise to do so for any particular period of time.
VI. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may revise this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect new or changed features and services, changes in the law, or changes in our use or collection of personal information. If you object to any terms and conditions of the Privacy Policy or any subsequent changes or you become dissatisfied with Slowly in any way, your only option is to delete your account. Your continued use of Slowly after we post a revised Privacy Policy means that you agree to the revisions.
VII. Language
This Privacy Policy was written in English. If you are reading a translation and it conflicts with the English version, please note that the English version controls.
VIII. Our Contact Information

If you have questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us.
Web: https://help.getslowly.com
Email: [email protected]
